profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-03 13:17:28 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: The collection includes copies of Nazi documents with translations, 1940-1947, and photographs (with personal information) of 63 inmates at the Dachau and Ravensbruck concentration camps. Items were retained by George Scheider, a refugee from Czechoslovakia who served as a translator at the Nuremberg tribunals.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: George Scheider was a refugee from Czechoslovakia who served as a translator at the Nuremberg tribunals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains copies of Nazi documents with translations from 1940-1947, and photographs (with personal information) of 63 inmates at the Dachau and Ravensbruck concentration camps.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records, sensitive information, and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, George Scheider Papers, 1940-1947. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Scheider Papers).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The provenance of this collection is unknown.

controlaccess.subject: Nuremberg War Crime Trials, Nuremberg, Germany, 1946-1949.
